welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lorgues, the charming city known for its rich history, delicious wine, and beautiful countryside. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Mole Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Mole Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
